paper_abstract: The solution set of a consistent system of fuzzy relational equations with max-min composition can be characterized by one maximum solution and a finite number of minimal solutions. A polynomial-time method of O(mn) complexity is proposed to determine whether such a system has a unique minimal solution and/or a unique solution, where m, n are the dimensions of the input data. The proposed method can be extended to examining a system of fuzzy relational equations with max-T composition where T is a continuous triangular norm.
paper_title: On the unique solvability of fuzzy relational equations
